titleStmt.title: A catechisme conteining the summe of Christian religion, giuing a most excellent light to all those that seek to enter the path-way to saluation: Newlie set foorth by G.G. Preacher of Gods word at Malden in Essex
titleStmt.author: Gifford, George, d. 1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: At the three Cranes in the Vintree by Thomas Dawson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
